name: Cat-Mas: Karen's Hunt
description:
Do you ever wanted to feel like a Karen during X-Mas?

Here is your chance, you can play a cat loving Karen in this small GameBoy game with the goal to find a present for your beloved cat: Mister Mitten.

Cat-Mas: Karen's Hunt is a video game done in the GB Studio Engine for the GB Studio Jam 2020.

Game Boy limitation

With the limitation of the Game Boy (and of the engine itself), the game was created/designed around that.

Controls

Here are the keys used to play the game.

Left - Left Arrow / A 

Right - Right Arrow / D 

A - Alt / Z / J - To shoot 

B - Ctrl / K / X  - To jump 

Select - Shift -  To press when it is asked

Notes

Due to being a university student and not having a lot of time (because of some other projects) the game was made in 2 days. Due to that there are no sounds/music in the game. -Christopher Herrig
